sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Typist from 'react-typist'; import { format } from 'timeago.js'; function ShowMessages({ foundMessages, userId, friendId, foundUser }) { return (
{ foundMessages.length !== 0 ? foundMessages.map((data, index) => (
{data.author}

{data.content}

{format(data.createdAt)}
)) : friendId ?

Lets Start Conversation with "{foundUser.name}"

:

Let's Chat

Let's Talk Virtual

It's An Online live Conversation

 }
) } export default ShowMessages
